task.question: Abraham was initially commanded to leave all of the following EXCEPT
The great tree of Moreh was in what town?
God first appeared to Abram in the land of Canaan when he was?

choices.choice: a. By the great tree of Moreh
b. On the threshing floor of Araunah
d. On the mountain of Gilboah

task.answer: a. By the great tree of Moreh

task.question: Why did Abraham go to Egypt?

choices.choice: a. There was a famine in the land of Canaan
b. He wanted to trade with the Egyptians
c.  The Canaanites drove him out
d. He found nowhere to settle among the Canaanites

task.answer: a. There was a famine in the land of Canaan

task.question: Where did Abraham build the first altar for God in the land of Canaan?
When the Egyptians saw Sarah's beauty how did they initially respond to Abraham ?

choices.choice: a. They gave Abram the choicest land in Egypt
b. They tried to give him gold and silver
c. They gave him sheep and cattle

task.answer: c. They gave him sheep and cattle

task.question: Between what two towns did Abram build an altar and call upon the name of the Lord?
What happened when Pharaoh took Sarah into his palace?

choices.choice: a. God caused a famine in the land of Egypt
b. God caused the sun to darken over the land of Egypt
c.  God inflicted disease on Pharaoh's household
d.  God rebuked Abram for lying about his wife

task.answer: c.  God inflicted disease on Pharaoh's household

task.question: When Abraham left Haran, who went with him?
Why did Abraham says that his wife is his sister in Egypt?

choices.choice: a. He knew that the Egyptians respected family bonds more than marriage bonds
b. He was afraid they would kill him to get her
c. He feared getting put into prison
d. He was trying to protect her from the Egyptians

task.answer: b. He was afraid they would kill him to get her
